title: The ICC
summary: Framework Innovation: Developed a white-label site framework for ICC tournaments, reducing reskinning time by 97% (1 month to 1 day).
Microsite Development: Created Criiio, a youth engagement microsite, providing personalised experiences and increasing engagement among young athletes.
Site Migration: Migrated the ICC site to Preact, enhancing performance and simplifying maintenance workflows.
Continuous Deployment: Maintained site stability and optimised performance through continuous deployment practices.
